'css/print/pdf.css' : 'css/print/paper.css'; document.getElementsByTagName( 'head' )[0].appendChild( link ); git good. an intro to source controlHowdy folks! There are times in life when the chips are down and the code is a mess. At times like these, there’s only one thing to do. Partner, you better git good.

Tyrant of a Thousand Suns Subjugator of Solar Systems and Mastermind Extraordinaire A name that inspires fear across the galaxy… SCOTT THOMAS[evil laugh, cut the music] Your instructor approaches!

Prez var link = document.createElement( 'link' ); link.rel = 'stylesheet'; link.type = 'text/css'; link.href = window.location.search.match( /print-pdf/gi ) ? 'css/print/pdf.css' : 'css/print/paper.css'; document.getElementsByTagName( 'head' )[0].appendChild( link ); I'm Scott, and I wanted to start by saying a little bit about being an astronomer. Astronomy is a great field to study and work in. Most days I get to do interesting things, and the days when I don't are few and far between.
